message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $11,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,500 is too low. How about we settle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above $10,000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $10,750?
